nodes.text: and the atheist cannot restrict the science to be according to their views.
But isn't that the problem? This creationist decided that science should be limited to his religion. He's afraid of flying.

Atheists may not believe even though you open the gates of heaven for them and they saw the angels with their own eyes; they are like the smoker who smokes cigarettes in spite of that he knows that cigarettes are harmful.
I think that's more true of believers. :) However, when you manage to demonstrate your deity by opening his gates, do let us know. We'll take a look around!
